name: Super Cave Boy: Forsaken Dungeon
description:
Super Cave Boy: Forsaken Dungeon is a 2D platformer game originally meant as a project for beginning developers created by Benjamin Anderson. We have taken the project and turned it into a more complete game with more levels, enemies, and plenty of other features. Fight various enemies such as snakes, bats, and spiders as you collect sapphires and other goodies. In the full game there are 3 stages of levels, each containing 9 regular levels that get progressively harder and 1 boss level, totalling 30 levels.

System requirements:

OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
CPU: 2.0 Ghz Intel or AMD processor
Memory: 1GB of RAM
Hard Drive: 35MB free hard drive space
